mapper.select:
select pad.* from patient_assay_dictionary pad
pad.is_enable = #{isEnable}
and pad.group_id like CONCAT('%',#{groupId},'%')
and pad.group_name like CONCAT('%',#{groupName},'%')
and pad.item_code like CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%')
and pad.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%')
